title: Cosmetic
details: Cosmetic dentistry is all about enhancing the appearance of your smile. Whether you’re looking to whiten your teeth, fix chips or gaps, or get a full smile makeover, our cosmetic treatments are designed to help you smile with confidence. We combine modern techniques with a gentle approach to deliver beautiful, natural-looking results.

title: Orthodontics
details: Orthodontic treatment helps align and straighten teeth, correct bite issues, and improve overall dental health. Whether it’s traditional metal braces or clear aligners, we offer customized solutions for children, teens, and adults to help you achieve a confident, well-aligned smile.

title: General
details: General dentistry focuses on maintaining your overall oral health through regular check-ups, cleanings, and basic treatments. From preventing tooth decay to treating cavities and gum issues, we’re here to keep your smile healthy, clean, and pain-free — for all ages.
point3: Minor oral surgery – including wisdom tooth and mucocele removal

title: Dental
details: Dental implants are a permanent solution for replacing missing teeth. They look, feel, and function like natural teeth — restoring both your smile and confidence. Whether you’ve lost a single tooth or multiple, implants offer a strong, long-lasting foundation for a healthier, complete smile.

title: Root Canal
details: A root canal is a safe and effective way to save a badly decayed or infected tooth. Instead of removing the tooth, the infected pulp is cleaned, sealed, and restored — relieving pain while keeping your natural tooth in place. With modern techniques, the procedure is comfortable and usually done in one or two visits.

title: Pediatric
details: Pediatric dentistry focuses on the dental care of infants, children, and teens. From baby teeth to braces, we provide gentle, friendly, and fun dental care in a comfortable environment. Our goal is to make every visit a positive experience and help kids build healthy dental habits for life.
point3: Cavity prevention (Flouride application and Fissure sealents)
